instructions.reason_for_call: You recently bought a laptop, but you want to exchange it to i9 CPU. If multiple storage options are available, you prefer 256GB SSD. If multiple colors are available, you prefer silver. You also have a pending order with five items (you don't remember order ID), and you want to cancel it because you no longer need them.

instructions.unknown_info: You don't have an email. If the agent asks for payment method for the order modification, say you want to use your credit card.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello, um, I recently bought a laptop from your store, and I was wondering if it's possible to exchange it for one with an i9 CPU? Also, I think I have a pending order with five items that I want to cancel because I don't need them anymore. Could you help me with these, please?

message.content: Hello, um, I recently bought a laptop from your store, and I was wondering if it's possible to exchange it for one with an i9 CPU? Also, I think I have a pending order with five items that I want to cancel because I don't need them anymore. Could you help me with these, please?
